content.rendered:
THE BEST THING EVERRRRRR.

What you will need:

-1 piece of whole wheat toast

-Olive oil

-1/2 of an avocado

-Handful of walnuts and pinenuts combined

-Salt and pepper

 

After you toast the bread, drizzle a little olive oil onto it.

Mash on the avocado. I usually use a little less than half of an avocado. Drizzle on a little more olive oil.

Sprinkle nuts for protein.

A touch of salt and pepper!

 

Enjoy!! This snack takes about 4 minutes. So easy for on-the-go as well.

Without nuts is always amazingly yummy, too!! And sometimes I add sliced tomatoes on top as well!
